titleStmt.title: The two great questions whereon in this present juncture of affairs, the peace & safety of His Maiestie's person, and of all His Protestant subjects in his three kingdoms next under God depend stated, debated, and humbly submitted to the consideration of Supreme Authority, as resolved by Christ.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, William, 1613 or 14-1681 or 2.

titleStmt.title: The two great questions whereon in this present juncture of affairs, the peace & safety of His Maiestie's person, and of all His Protestant subjects in his three kingdoms next under God depend stated, debated, and humbly submitted to the consideration of Supreme Authority, as resolved by Christ.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, William, 1613 or 14-1681 or 2.

notesStmt.note: Attributed by Wing to William Lawrence.
This item appears at reel 462:1 as Wing L693, and at reel 718:16 as Wing L97A (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.).
